name: Spice Mishap
description:
Help your friend get to the underworld's restroom so he can rinse his eye sockets from all the oregano that got in there!

--------- Controls -------------
MOVE: ESDF, arrow keys, Controller D-pad and left analogue stick
JUMP: Space, K, X, Xbox controller B
PICK UP LADDER: J, Z, Xbox controller A
PAUSE: ESC, ENTER, Xbox Start
